title: Gifting Icon
body:
Okay, so I gifted a friend Xayah {{champion:498}}  during the time period you could while the icon rewards were up. I'm curious if the person you gift has to open the gift in order to receive the icon, as well as if it has to be opened in the time period... It's been two weeks since I've sent Xayah {{champion:498}} to my friend, and still, haven't received the Gift of Magic icon... I would like to know if I can still get it because my friend opened the gift quite a bit after the time period... Thank you for your help in advance!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: Weeeeeeird! I pulled up your account and see that you did send Xayah during the event period, so I've gone ahead and added the Gift of Magic Icon to your account ^_^!
I also gifted 2 weeks ago but haven't gotten the icon yet  o.o"

Thanks! I realized I did get it shortly after I put up the post! Haven't checked back here since I put that up. I just checked and realized you replied. Lol, thanks again.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
